div.p: This work was supported by JSPS KAKENHI Grant Numbers 15K17775 and 18K03757. It was also performed under the cooperative research programme of the Center for Advanced Marine Core Research, Kochi University (Accept Nos. 16A042, 16B038, 17A019 and 17B019). We appreciate Ms. Keiko Funaki for her assistance with taking soft X-ray pictures. We are grateful to Prof. Fahu Chen and Dr. Jianhui Chen for preparing their useful data. We also thank Mr. Kentaro Kuroki and Ms. Rina Iida for their help with sampling and preparation.
